page.title: 04Home Life
page.content: I share a bedroom with my sister Michelle. My sister Sarah has a room of her own.My mum and dad sleep next door to my room. For breakfast I have cereal and then go to Saturday Band. I play the guitar and Sarah plays the cornet. My dad works at Holme Moss,my mum looks after playschool. These are some of the things I like :- animals, drawing, writing, playing and walking. Sometimes I go walking with my Auntie Brenda and my Uncle Geoff. My auntie's dog always pulls us along. We have seen squirrels in the trees and the rabbits have made holes in the ground. One of my trees has a nest with some baby birds in.For dinner I sometimes have sausage, chips and beans and for tea I sometimes have a sandwich spread sandwich.
